channel.title: Golang on 蛮荆
channel.description: Recent content in Golang on 蛮荆

item.title: Go Quick Start
item.description: 这本书是写什么的？ 这是一本 Go 语言快速入门手册，目标读者是有任一编程语言基础，希望以最快的时间 (比如一个周末) 入门 Go 语言。

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Style Guide
item.description: Headings Heading 1 Heading 2 Heading 3 Heading 4 Heading 5 Heading 6 Headings with Text Heading 1 Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, adipiscing elit.

item.title: Creating a New Theme
item.description: Introduction This tutorial will show you how to create a simple theme in Hugo.

item.title: (Hu)go Template Primer
item.description: Hugo uses the excellent go html/template library for its template engine.

item.title: Migrate to Hugo from Jekyll
item.description: Move static content to static Jekyll has a rule that any directory not starting with _ will be copied as-is to the _site output.
